vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.9;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Aridai = "the lion is enough"
a son of Haman
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞利代 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "獅子是足夠的"
哈曼的兒子 {#斯 9:9|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚利代 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "狮子是足够的"
哈曼的儿子 {#斯 9:9|}
